```{r message=F, warning=FALSE}
library(httr)
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://edj.trf1.jus.br/edj/discover"
path_html <- "data-raw/"
dir.create(path_html, FALSE, TRUE)
  path_html <- normalizePath(path_html)
  file <- stringr::str_c(path_html, "/page1.html")
httr::GET(url, httr::config(ssl_verifypeer = FALSE), httr::write_disk(file, TRUE))
```
